name: Bean game (thelilkman)
description:
BEAN GAME!!! 

the buggiest game EVER

its going to be a shooter with parkour, (I know, Brand new idea) its gonna have some dumb story line and idk guns and enemies, I mean it is a shooter

PLEASE NOTE

this is a beta and stuff doesn't work yet, this is just an idea so expect EVERYTHING to change

Current to-do

Get jumping to work

Make levels

Make a storyline

Get the gun working

Get the enemies working

Finnish the main menu

The list goes on but that's the main stuff

Btw I'd really appreciate any feedback in the comments, and thanks for at least checking the game out!
